P1_SEV1_MISHANDLING.reasoning: This was explicitly raised as a Severity 1 outage. While engineering work appears fast, the support workflow shows concerning signals for a Sev1 (e.g., placing the case on hold for an extreme duration, and the ticket not being marked solved/closed until a week later per CSV). This suggests potential process mishandling even though the technical fix was timely.
